sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react' import { Avatar, Button } from 'antd' import PubSub from 'pubsub-js' export default class User extends Component { state = { user: null } componentDidMount() { PubSub.subscribe('showUserInfo', (msg, user) => this.setState({ user })) console.log(this.state.user) } render() { const { user } = this.state if (!user) return null return (
{user.name}
手机号：183***8888
) } }
